trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta ordinata di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: All objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> have an InputBindingCollection named <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli oggetti che derivano da <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>un InputBindingCollection denominato <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: All objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> have an InputBindingCollection named <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.InputBindings%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli oggetti che derivano da <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>un InputBindingCollection denominato <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.InputBindings%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.InputBindings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>

trans-unit.source: However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> rather than direct <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se questi insiemi sono impostati [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], quindi gli elementi nella raccolta devono essere classi derivate di <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>anziché diretto <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> does not support a default public constructor.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>non supporta un costruttore pubblico predefinito.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the items in a InputBindingCollection that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, gli elementi in un InputBindingCollection che è stato impostato in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] corrisponderà in genere una <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>classe che supporta un costruttore pubblico predefinito, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> o</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> derivata</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> class using the items in the specified <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref> classe usando gli elementi di <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> specificato

trans-unit.source: The collection whose items are copied to the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta i cui elementi vengono copiati nel nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The binding to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: L'associazione da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Always returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre 0.

trans-unit.source: This deviates from the standard <xref:System.Collections.IList> implementation for <xref uid="langword_csharp_Add" name="Add" href=""></xref>, which should return the index where the new item was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo si differenzia dallo standard <xref:System.Collections.IList>implementazione per <xref uid="langword_csharp_Add" name="Add" href=""> </xref>, che deve restituire l'indice in cui è stato aggiunto il nuovo elemento alla raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: inputBinding is .
trans-unit.target: inputBindingis .

trans-unit.source: Adds the items of the specified <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> to the end of this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge gli elementi dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>alla fine di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The collection of items to add to the end of this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta di elementi da aggiungere alla fine di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti gli elementi da questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> is in this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> è contenuto in<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>

trans-unit.source: The binding to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: L'associazione da individuare nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> è presente nella raccolta; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> to the specified one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia tutti gli elementi di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref> nella matrice unidimensionale specificata, a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The array into which the collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: Matrice in cui viene copiata la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The index position in `inputBindings` at which copying starts.
trans-unit.target: La posizione dell'indice in `inputBindings` in cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: inputBindings is .
trans-unit.target: inputBindingsis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> items in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> gli elementi nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di elementi nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that iterates through this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un enumeratore che scorre questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator for this collection.
trans-unit.target: L'enumeratore per questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> in his <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cerca la prima occorrenza dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> nel suo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da individuare nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first occurrence of value, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice della prima occorrenza di value , se presente; in caso contrario, –&1;.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> into this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> in questa <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `inputBinding`.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale inserire `inputBinding`.

trans-unit.source: The binding to insert.
trans-unit.target: Associazione da inserire.

trans-unit.source: inputBinding is .
trans-unit.target: inputBindingis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref> ha dimensioni fisse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> is never a fixed size; therefore, IsFixedSize always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection>non è mai di dimensioni fisse; pertanto, restituisce sempre IsFixedSize `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la raccolta ha dimensioni fisse. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref> è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> is never read-only; therefore, IsReadOnly always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection>mai è di sola lettura; pertanto, restituisce sempre IsReadOnly `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la raccolta è di sola lettura. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"> </xref> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is thread safe; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la raccolta è thread-safe. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.
